title: Create Pennywise platform with brands and virtual assistant provider listings

requirements.text: Create a backend data model for Brands with fields: id, name, description, and logo URL
acceptanceCriteria: Brand type is defined in the backend with all specified fields
Brands can be stored and retrieved from the backend

requirements.text: Create a backend data model for Virtual Assistant Providers with fields: id, name, description, contact information, and payment per client
acceptanceCriteria: Virtual Assistant Provider type is defined with all specified fields including payment per client
Providers can be stored and retrieved from the backend

requirements.text: Implement backend functionality to add and retrieve the list of Brands
acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes a query method to retrieve all brands
Backend exposes an update method to add new brands

requirements.text: Implement backend functionality to add and retrieve Virtual Assistant Providers sorted by payment per client in descending order
acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes a query method to retrieve all providers sorted by payment per client (highest first)
Backend exposes an update method to add new providers

requirements.text: Create a frontend page that displays a list of all Brands with their name, description, and logo
acceptanceCriteria: Brands page shows all brands retrieved from the backend
Each brand displays its name, description, and logo image
Page handles loading and error states appropriately

requirements.text: Create a frontend page that displays Virtual Assistant Providers listed in order of payment per client, showing name, description, payment rate, and contact information
acceptanceCriteria: Providers page shows all providers sorted by payment per client (highest first)
Each provider card displays name, description, payment per client rate, and contact information
Page handles loading and error states appropriately

requirements.text: Implement a contact mechanism on the frontend that allows clients to initiate contact with a selected Virtual Assistant Provider
acceptanceCriteria: Each provider listing has a contact button or link
Clicking contact displays the provider's contact information or opens a contact form
Contact interaction is clear and intuitive for clients

requirements.text: Design a cohesive visual theme with warm, professional colors (avoiding blue and purple), modern typography, and a clean layout that emphasizes trust and professionalism suitable for a business services platform
acceptanceCriteria: Color palette uses warm, professional tones that convey trust
Typography is modern and readable across all pages
Layout is clean and consistent throughout the application
Design reinforces the professional nature of the platform

constraints: All backend logic must be implemented in a single Motoko actor
Frontend must use React with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and React Query
Do not modify immutable frontend paths including useInternetIdentity hooks, useActor hook, main.tsx, and ui components
nonGoals: Real-time chat or messaging between clients and providers
Admin panel for managing brands and providers
